name: LangChain
description: A framework for developing applications powered by language models. LangChain makes it easy to chain together multiple LLM calls and integrate with various data sources.
shortDescription: Framework for building LLM-powered applications and agents

name: Cursor
description: An AI-powered code editor that enhances developer productivity with intelligent code suggestions, refactoring, and debugging assistance.

name: Tavily
description: AI-powered search engine for developers and researchers. Provides semantic search capabilities and knowledge retrieval for AI applications.
shortDescription: The Web Access Layer for AI Agents

name: Parallel Web Systems
description: The Search API takes a natural language objective and returns relevant excerpts optimized for LLMs, replacing multiple keyword searches with a single call for broad or complex queries.
shortDescription: The most accurate tools for AI agents to search and reason over the web.

name: Exa
description: AI-powered search engine for developers and researchers. Provides semantic search capabilities and knowledge retrieval for AI applications.
shortDescription: We're an AI research lab building search for the future.

name: CodeRabbit
description: AI-powered code review assistant that provides intelligent feedback on pull requests, identifies bugs, and suggests improvements.
shortDescription: Supercharge your dev team with AI code reviews.

name: Fal
description: Cloud platform for running generative AI models, specializing in image and video generation with fast inference.

name: Supermemory
description: Supermemory gives your LLMs long-term memory. Instead of stateless text generation, they recall the right facts from your files, chats, and tools, so responses stay consistent, contextual, and personal.
shortDescription: Context engine for your LLMs, Personalized for your users.

name: Mem0
description: Mem0 is a universal, self‑improving memory layer for LLM applications, powering personalised AI experiences that cut costs and enhance user delight.
shortDescription: The memory Layer for your AI Apps.

name: Windsurf
description: An advanced AI coding assistant and IDE focused on agentic workflows, code generation, and seamless integration with LLMs.

name: Pinecone
description: A managed vector database service that makes it easy to add vector search to production applications. Perfect for semantic search, RAG, and recommendation systems.
shortDescription: The vector database for scale in production.

name: HelixDB
description: HelixDB is a database that makes it easy to build all the components needed for an AI application in a single platform. You no longer need a separate application DB, vector DB, graph DB, or application layers to manage the multiple storage locations to build the backend of any application that uses AI, agents or RAG. Just use Helix. HelixDB primarily operates with a graph + vector data model, but it can also support KV, documents, and relational data.
shortDescription: An open-source graph-vector database built in Rust.

name: AI SDK
description: The AI SDK makes it easy to build AI-powered applications with React, Vue, Svelte, and Node. Provides a unified API for streaming, tools, and more.

name: AI SDK Tools
description: Essential utilities that extend and improve the Vercel AI SDK experience. Multi-agent orchestration, state management, debugging tools, and structured artifact streaming - everything you need to build advanced AI applications beyond simple chat interfaces.
shortDescription: Everything you need to build advanced AI interfaces beyond simple chat applications.

name: OpenAI API
description: Access GPT-4, GPT-3.5, embeddings, and other powerful AI models through OpenAI's API. The standard for building AI-powered applications.
shortDescription: Access to GPT-4 and other powerful AI models

name: Anthropic Claude
description: Claude is Anthropic's AI assistant API, featuring advanced reasoning, long context windows, and strong safety features. Great for complex tasks and analysis.
shortDescription: Advanced AI assistant with long context windows

name: Neon Serverless
description: A serverless Postgres database with AI integrations, branching, and autoscaling for AI workloads.

name: Qdrant
description: Open-source vector similarity search engine and vector database. High performance, production-ready vector search with filtering capabilities.

name: Convex
description: Open-source vector similarity search engine and vector database. High performance, production-ready vector search with filtering capabilities.
shortDescription: The backend platform she tells you not to worry about.

name: Planetscale
description: Open-source vector similarity search engine and vector database. High performance, production-ready vector search with filtering capabilities.
shortDescription: The fastest and most reliable database for Postgres & Vitess

name: Weaviate
description: Open-source vector database that stores both objects and vectors. Includes built-in modules for embeddings generation, classification, and question answering.
shortDescription: Start fast, scale to billions with a feature-rich vector database trusted by AI innovators

name: LlamaIndex
description: A data framework for LLM applications. LlamaIndex provides the tools to ingest, structure, and access private or domain-specific data for LLMs.
shortDescription: AI Agents for document OCR + workflows

name: Supabase Vector
description: Postgres extension for vector similarity search. Build AI applications with pgvector and Supabase's managed Postgres database.

name: Supabase Postgres
description: Postgres extension for vector similarity search. Build AI applications with pgvector and Supabase's managed Postgres database.
shortDescription: Postgres extension for vector similarity search

name: Supabase Storage
description: Postgres extension for vector similarity search. Build AI applications with pgvector and Supabase's managed Postgres database.
shortDescription: Postgres extension for vector similarity search

name: AutoGen
description: An open-source framework for building multi-agent conversational systems, enabling agents to collaborate on tasks with human feedback loops.

name: CrewAI
description: A framework for orchestrating role-playing AI agents that collaborate to solve complex tasks, with built-in tools and memory.

name: LangGraph
description: An extension of LangChain for building stateful, multi-actor applications with LLMs, featuring cycles, controllability, and persistence.

name: Semantic Kernel
description: Semantic Kernel is a lightweight, open-source development kit that lets you easily build AI agents and integrate the latest AI models into your C#, Python, or Java codebase. It serves as an efficient middleware that enables rapid delivery of enterprise-grade solutions.

name: Milvus
description: Milvus is an open-source vector database built for GenAI applications. Install with pip, perform high-speed searches, and scale to tens of billions of vectors with minimal performance loss.
shortDescription: The High-Performance Vector Database Built for Scale

name: Gemini AI
description: Google's family of multimodal LLMs, offering advanced reasoning, code generation, and API access for AI applications.

name: Mistral AI
description: Open and proprietary LLMs focused on efficiency, with APIs for fine-tuning and deployment in AI apps.

name: Meta Llama
description: Open-source LLMs from Meta, including Llama 3, for building customizable AI applications.

name: Redis
description: In-memory data store used for caching, real-time analytics, and vector search in AI applications.
shortDescription: Build AI apps with more speed, memory, and accuracy.

name: MongoDB
description: NoSQL database with vector search capabilities via Atlas, suitable for flexible AI data storage.

name: SingleStore
description: Distributed SQL database with vector support, optimized for real-time AI and analytics workloads.

name: AWS SageMaker
description: Fully managed platform for building, training, and deploying machine learning models at scale.

name: Azure Machine Learning
description: Cloud-based service for end-to-end ML workflows, including data prep, model training, and deployment.

name: Google Cloud AI
description: Suite of AI and ML tools for building, deploying, and managing models on Google Cloud infrastructure.

name: Perplexity
description: AI-powered search engine and answer engine that provides accurate, cited responses using advanced LLMs.

name: Langfuse
description: Open-source LLM observability platform for tracing, evaluations, prompt management, and metrics.

name: PostHog
description: Open-source LLM observability platform for tracing, evaluations, prompt management, and metrics.

name: Upstash Redis
description: Serverless Redis database with per-request pricing and REST API. Perfect for caching, session management, and real-time features in AI applications. Built for serverless and edge environments with global low-latency access.
shortDescription: Serverless Redis for edge and serverless apps

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Upstash Ratelimit
description: Serverless Redis database with per-request pricing and REST API. Perfect for caching, session management, and real-time features in AI applications. Built for serverless and edge environments with global low-latency access.
shortDescription: Serverless Ratelimiting for edge and serverless apps

name: Arcjet
description: Rate limiting and bot protection for APIs and web applications. Arcjet provides a simple API to protect your application from abuse with features like rate limiting, bot detection, and DDoS protection.
shortDescription: Rate limiting and bot protection for modern applications.

name: Unkey
description: Serverless functions offer a ton of benefits but unfortunately make some things much harder too. Ratelimiting is one of these things as it requires some persistent state to coordinate different limits. Unkey's ratelimit API provides a global low latency solution to limit your functions and protect upstream services.
shortDescription: Fast global ratelimiting in serverless functions.

name: Cloudflare KV
description: Serverless Redis database with per-request pricing and REST API. Perfect for caching, session management, and real-time features in AI applications. Built for serverless and edge environments with global low-latency access.
shortDescription: Serverless key-value storage for applications on Cloudflare

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Cloudflare D1
description: Workflows is a durable execution engine built on Cloudflare Workers. Workflows allow you to build multi-step applications that can automatically retry, persist state and run for minutes, hours, days, or weeks. Workflows introduces a programming model that makes it easier to build reliable, long-running tasks, observe as they progress, and programmatically trigger instances based on events across your services.
shortDescription: Build a natively serveless SQL Database with Cloudflare D1.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Cloudflare Vecorize
description: Begin building for free in minutes. Vectorize enables fast & cost-effective vector storage to power your search & AI Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) applications. Avoid tool sprawl & reduce total cost of ownership: Vectorize seamlessly integrates with Cloudflare's AI developer platform-Workers AI and AI Gateway for centralized development, monitoring & control of AI applications on a global scale.
shortDescription: High speed, globally distributed and cost-efficient vector database.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Cloudflare Workflows
description: Workflows is a durable execution engine built on Cloudflare Workers. Workflows allow you to build multi-step applications that can automatically retry, persist state and run for minutes, hours, days, or weeks. Workflows introduces a programming model that makes it easier to build reliable, long-running tasks, observe as they progress, and programmatically trigger instances based on events across your services.
shortDescription: Build durable multi-step applications on Cloudflare Workers with Workflows.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Cloudflare R2
description: Cloudflare R2 Storage allows developers to store large amounts of unstructured data without the costly egress bandwidth fees associated with typical cloud storage services.
shortDescription: Global object storage with zero egress fees

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Tigris Data
description: Tigris is a globally distributed, multi-cloud object storage service with built-in support for the S3 API. It uses Dynamic Data Placement and Access-Based Rebalancing to deliver low-latency access worldwide — without the need to manage replication or caching.
shortDescription: The storage layer purpose built for AI

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Upstash Vector
description: Serverless vector database designed for AI applications, featuring similarity search, metadata filtering, and REST API. Optimized for RAG systems and semantic search with pay-per-request pricing and global edge deployment.
shortDescription: Serverless vector database for AI apps

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: Upstash QStash
description: Serverless message queue and task scheduler for distributed systems. Enables reliable message delivery, scheduled tasks, and workflow orchestration with HTTP-based API. Ideal for AI agent workflows and async processing.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per message

name: Upstash Workflow
description: Serverless workflow engine for orchestrating multi-step AI tasks and agent workflows. Build reliable, durable executions with automatic retries, state management, and step functions. Perfect for complex AI pipelines and LLM chains.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per step execution

name: Inngest
description: Serverless workflow engine for orchestrating multi-step AI tasks and agent workflows. Build reliable, durable executions with automatic retries, state management, and step functions. Perfect for complex AI pipelines and LLM chains.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per step execution

name: Evidently AI
description: Evidently is an open-source Python library to evaluate, test, and monitor ML and LLM systems—from experiments to production.
shortDescription: Open source ML and LLM evaluation, testing and monitoring.

name: Dynatrace
description: AI-powered observability platform for monitoring applications, infrastructure, and LLM performance.
shortDescription: AI observability for apps and infra

name: Hugging Face
description: Platform for building, deploying, and sharing ML models, with hosting for AI agents and inference endpoints.

name: Replicate
description: Cloud platform for running and deploying ML models, with easy API access for AI applications.

name: Vercel
description: Platform for deploying frontend and serverless applications, with built-in support for AI SDKs and edge functions.

name: Fly.io
description: Platform for deploying frontend and serverless applications, with built-in support for AI SDKs and edge functions.
shortDescription: Run web, AI, & app servers close to your users on CPUs and GPUs.

name: Firecrawl
description: Turn websites into LLM-ready data.

name: Render
description: Cloud platform for deploying web applications, APIs, databases, and background workers with automatic scaling.
shortDescription: The modern cloud for application developers and teams.

name: xmcp
description: xmcp is a framework for building and shipping MCP servers with TypeScript. Designed with DX in mind, it simplifies setup and removes friction in just one command — making it easy to build & deploy AI tools on top of the Model Context Protocol ecosystem.
shortDescription: The TypeScript framework for building & shipping MCP servers.

name: Speakeasy
description: Platform for generating type-safe SDKs and API documentation that are optimized for both developers and LLMs.
shortDescription: Generate MCP servers and SDKs from OpenAPI.

name: ElevenLabs
description: AI voice generation platform for creating realistic text-to-speech, voice cloning, and audio content for applications.
shortDescription: The voice of technology. Bringing the world's knowledge, stories and agents to life.

name: n8n
description: Open-source workflow automation platform for building AI workflows with visual interface and code flexibility.

name: Workflow DevKit
description: Developer toolkit for building durable, resilient, and observable workflows for AI applications.
shortDescription: Build durable, resilient, and observable workflows.

name: Trigger.dev
description: Platform for building and deploying background jobs, AI agents, and long-running workflows with built-in observability.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI-powered code completion tool integrated into IDEs, suggesting code and entire functions.

description: AI coding assistant that provides context-aware code completions across multiple IDEs.

description: Free AI-powered code acceleration toolkit for developers, supporting multiple languages and IDEs.

description: AI platform providing LLMs and APIs for building enterprise-grade generative AI applications.

description: Cloud platform for building and running generative AI models with open-source flexibility.

description: Open-source framework for building search systems with LLMs, including RAG pipelines and agents.

name: Agno

name: CopilotKit

name: Vespa
description: Vespa.ai is an AI Search Platform for developing and operating large-scale applications that combine big data, vector search, machine-learned ranking, and real-time inference. With native tensor support for complex ranking and decisioning, Vespa enables real-time AI applications like RAG, recommendation, and intelligent search—at enterprise scale.
shortDescription: Vectors/tensors, full-text, structured data; ML model inference at scale.

name: Opik
description: Debug, evaluate, and monitor your LLM applications, RAG systems, and agentic workflows with tracing, eval metrics, and production-ready dashboards..

description: Platform for evaluating and monitoring AI systems, with tools for debugging and improving LLM apps.

description: High-performance code editor with AI integrations for collaborative coding.

description: AI-powered full-stack development platform for building and deploying web applications through conversational interface.

description: AI-powered IDE focused on natural language coding and rapid prototyping.

name: Novita AI
description: Ship models and agents in minutes, call 200+ models with one API, and run secure, fast agent sandboxes— developer-first and startup-friendly.

name: Falcon LLM
description: High-performing open-source LLM for various AI tasks, developed by TII.

name: StreamDown
description: A drop-in replacement for react-markdown, designed for AI-powered streaming.
shortDescription: A drop-in replacement for react-markdown, designed for AI-powered streaming.

name: Polar
description: Payment infrastructure for the 21st century. Polar provides the tools and APIs needed to handle subscriptions, one-time payments, and financial operations for modern applications.

name: shadcn/ui
description: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. shadcn/ui provides accessible, customizable, and reusable components that you can copy and paste into your apps. It's not a component library but a collection of reusable components that you can copy and paste into your apps.
shortDescription: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

name: AI Elements
description: AI Elements provides pre-built, customizable React components specifically designed for AI applications, including conversations, messages, code blocks, reasoning displays, and more. Part of the Vercel AI SDK, it includes 20+ production-ready React components for building AI interfaces with built-in support for streaming, loading states, and error handling.
shortDescription: A component library built on top of shadcn/ui to help you build AI-native applications faster.

name: Prompt Kit
description: A collection of high-quality, accessible, and customizable components for building AI interfaces. Provides core building blocks for AI applications, including markdown rendering, code highlighting, and chat interfaces. Built on top of shadcn/ui for consistent theming and styling.
shortDescription: Core building blocks for AI applications with beautiful, accessible components.

name: xAI Grok
description: xAI's Grok LLM with advanced reasoning capabilities, image input support, and real-time information access. Built for complex problem-solving and analysis.

name: Azure OpenAI
description: Microsoft Azure's enterprise-grade OpenAI service with GPT-4, GPT-3.5, and embeddings. Includes enhanced security, compliance, and regional availability.

name: Amazon Bedrock
description: Fully managed service providing access to foundation models from leading AI companies through a single API. Includes Claude, Llama, Mistral, and more with AWS security and scalability.

name: DeepInfra
description: Serverless inference API for running open-source LLMs and image models. Fast, cost-effective access to models like Llama, Mistral, and Stable Diffusion.

name: Google Vertex AI
description: Google Cloud's unified AI platform for building, deploying, and scaling ML models. Includes Gemini models, custom training, and MLOps tools.
shortDescription: Unified AI platform on Google Cloud

name: Cerebras
description: Ultra-fast inference platform powered by Cerebras CS-3 chip. Delivers industry-leading speed for LLM inference with support for Llama and other open models.

name: Luma AI
description: AI platform for generating high-quality 3D models and video content. Specializes in photorealistic 3D capture and generation for creative applications.

name: Baseten
description: Platform for deploying and scaling ML models with serverless infrastructure. Supports custom models and popular open-source LLMs with fast inference.

name: Ollama
description: Run large language models locally on your machine. Simple CLI and API for running Llama, Mistral, and other open-source models without cloud dependencies.

name: Anthropic Vertex
description: Claude models available through Google Cloud's Vertex AI platform. Combines Anthropic's advanced AI with Google Cloud's enterprise infrastructure and security.

name: Portkey
description: AI gateway for managing and routing requests across multiple LLM providers. Includes load balancing, fallbacks, caching, and observability for production AI apps.

name: Cloudflare Workers AI
description: Run AI models on Cloudflare's global edge network. Access to LLMs, image generation, and embeddings with serverless deployment and low latency worldwide.

pricing.price: Free tier available, pay per request

name: OpenRouter
description: Unified API for accessing multiple LLM providers including OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, and more. Route requests to the best model for your use case with automatic fallbacks and load balancing.

name: Vercel AI Gateway
description: Production-ready AI gateway for managing LLM requests with caching, rate limiting, analytics, and cost tracking. Seamlessly integrates with the Vercel AI SDK and supports all major LLM providers.
shortDescription: AI gateway with caching and analytics

name: Kimi
description: Large language model from Moonshot AI with exceptional long-context capabilities (up to 200K tokens). Optimized for Chinese and English, excelling at document analysis and complex reasoning tasks.

name: Qwen
description: Open-source large language models from Alibaba Cloud with strong multilingual capabilities. Includes Qwen-Turbo and Qwen-Plus variants optimized for various tasks including coding, math, and reasoning.

name: Midjourney
description: AI-powered image generation platform creating stunning, high-quality artwork from text prompts. Known for its artistic style and photorealistic capabilities, widely used by designers and artists.

name: Google Gemini App
description: Google's AI assistant app powered by Gemini models. Chat interface for coding, writing, analysis, and creative tasks with multimodal capabilities.

name: Claude Code
description: Anthropic's Claude optimized for coding tasks. Excels at code generation, debugging, refactoring, and technical documentation with long context windows.

name: ChatGPT

name: Grok

name: Chef by Convex
description: AI-powered development assistant by Convex for building full-stack applications. Helps with database schema design, backend logic, and real-time features.

name: Firebase Studio
description: AI-powered development environment for Firebase projects. Assists with database design, security rules, cloud functions, and Firebase integration.

name: Gemini CLI
description: Command-line interface for Google's Gemini AI models. Enables AI-powered coding assistance directly in your terminal with scripting and automation capabilities.

name: OpenCode
description: Open-source AI coding assistant with support for multiple LLMs. Privacy-focused alternative for code generation, completion, and refactoring.
shortDescription: The AI coding agent built for the terminal.

name: T3 Chat
description: AI chat interface built with the T3 stack (Next.js, tRPC, Tailwind, Prisma). Open-source template for building custom AI chat applications with type safety.

name: Mastra
description: TypeScript-native AI agent framework from the Gatsby team. Build intelligent agents with workflows, RAG, memory, and observability. Features durable graph-based state machines, unified provider API, and built-in tracing for production AI applications.
shortDescription: The TypeScript Framework for building Agents.
